attributes.action: Ask the police to investigate, obscene phone calls made in the name of "comedy"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is illegal for an individual to make an unsolicited obscene phone call. Yet well known celebrities not only make these obscene phone calls in the name of "comedy" but the broadcast organisations actively condone this illegal activity.

These celebs are role models for youngsters and I know from personal experience that it is not funny to be called up out of the blue and have rude suggestions made - however funny the calling thinks they are.

We call upon the PM to take the necessary action to ensure the police investigate this illegal activity and if necessary bring charges against any individuals or organisations either engaged in or appearing to condone this activity.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
